description: AI image generation MCP server using Nano Banana Pro with intelligent prompt enhancement

GEMINI_API_KEY.description: Google Gemini API key for image generation (get from https://aistudio.google.com/apikey)

IMAGE_OUTPUT_DIR.description: Absolute path to directory where generated images will be saved (defaults to ./output)

SKIP_PROMPT_ENHANCEMENT.description: Set to 'true' to disable automatic prompt optimization and use direct prompts
